actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution disapproving the alternative plan for pay adjustments for Federal employees recommended and submitted by the President to the Congress on August 31, 1978, under section 5305(c) of title 5, United States Code.

summary.text: Expresses the House of Representatives disapproval of the President's alternative plan for pay adjustments for Federal employees recommended and submitted to the Congress on August 31, 1978.

titles.title: A resolution disapproving the alternative plan for pay adjustments for Federal employees recommended and submitted by the President to the Congress on August 31, 1978, under section 5305(c) of title 5, United States Code.
